meanings.definition: A gift or present given to someone.
meanings.sent1: I received a lovely prezzie on my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped the prezzie in colorful paper.
meanings.sent3: The prezzie made me smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a prezzie that brightened my day.
meanings.sent5: The prezzie was a small box filled with joy.

meanings.definition: To give a gift or present to someone.
meanings.sent1: I prezzied my friend with a book for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: They prezzie gifts to children in need every holiday season.
meanings.sent3: He prezzied his sister with a handmade card.
meanings.sent4: She prezzied her parents with a surprise visit.
meanings.sent5: We prezzie each other on special occasions.
